frameset.edef: to exert or strive, to do

role.argrole: thing being striven for or exerted

example.parse: (CONJ ف) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أثنى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تبذل) (NP-OBJ (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الجمعية)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN خدمة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المحتاجين))))))))))
